branchCategory.name: PA
branchCategory.description: <p>Series PA is a double acting, compact, large capacity diaphragm pump suitable for transfer and recovery of a wide variety of fluids. The PA series is available in 3 types; automatically operated, air operated or automatically operated with a built-in pulsation attenuator.</p>

branchItem.name: PA**13, Process Pump, Double Acting, Air Operated
PA3000, Process Pump, Double Acting, Automatically Operated
55/56-PA3/5000 Process Pump, Double Acting, Atex Category 2/3
branchItem.description: <p>Series 55/56-PA is an ATEX Category 2/3 air pilot process pump suitable for transfer and recovery of a wide variety of fluids.</p>

branchItem.name: PA3300, Process Pump, Air Pilot Type, Fluoro Resin Body
PA5000, Process Pump, Double Acting, Automatically Operated
PAX1000, Process Pump, Automatically Operated, Internal Switching
